section_full_path: Sign up > New Onboarding > Active Locations
title: Verify Pro is able to complete onboarding flow without resume or positions selected in English

custom_steps_separated.content:
Launch app and tap "Create account" -> Enter "first name", "last name", phone number", and/or "Email address" -> Tap "Next"

- Email address is optional
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Error messages if 
- no inputs for name or phone number
- invalid phone number
- invalid email address

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111101)   ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111102)

Error message if 
- no input for verification code
- incorrect verification code

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111103) ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111104)

custom_steps_separated.content:
(if the app is newly installed) Pro should see the "Instawork would like to send you notification" pop-up model  -> Tap "Allow"

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111105)

Pro should land on "Hey <Pro name>, let's add your profile photo" screen with "I'll do this later" link at the bottom -> proceed to add a photo

  ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111106)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
With REQUIRE_PROFILE_IMAGE_UPLOAD enabled, photo is now mandatory during onboarding
"Next" button is only visible AFTER a photo was added.

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111107)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Pro should land on "Let's add your date of birth" -> Enter a birthdate

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111108)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
An error should display if 
- no birthdate was entered.
- birthdate entered is under 18

(Birthdate is now required to complete sign up)


 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111109)   ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111110)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Pro should land on "Where do you live?" -> Enter a location -> Tap "Next"
 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111111)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Error should display if no location was entered

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111112) 

Pro should be able to see the corresponding map below the entered location

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111113)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Pro should land on "You will have access to these entry-level positions" with the 6 entry-level positions: 
        - GL
        - Warehouse Associate - Entry Level
        - Event Setup and Takedown
        - Custodial
        - Counter Staff / Cashier
        - Concession / Stand Worker


Without selecting any positions, tap "Next" 


 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111114)

Pro should land on "Select the advanced positions you are interested in" with a list of skilled positions sorted by categories.

Without selecting any positions, tap "Next" 

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111115)

Pro should land on "Create your Instawork profile to get access to shifts" followed by
- Import your resume
- Don't have a resume?


Tap "Don't have a resume?" link 

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111116)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Pro should be redirected to "Review and save profile" screen without any data input except name and location.

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111117)

custom_steps_separated.content:
On "Review and save profile" screen, scroll to the bottom and tap "Save profile" 

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111118)

Pro should land on "Contractor Service Agreement" -> Scroll down to the bottom and tap "I agree and accept" 

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111119)
custom_steps_separated.expected: The "I agree and accept" CTA is only enabled AFTER pro has scrolled to the bottom of the screen

custom_steps_separated.content:
Pro should land on "Congrats!" screen with "Book your first shift" CTA and a "Account created successfully" green toast on top 
-> Tap on either the "back <-" button or the "Book your first shift" CTA

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111120)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
If  "Find people you may know on Instawork" screen is presented, tap <- to proceed to the "Open shifts" screen
* Expected result: "Find people you may know on Instawork" screen should be removed
* This will be improved along in this ticket: https://project-tracker.example.com/tasks/45679

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111121) 


Pro should be redirected to "Open shifts" screen
 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111122)

AdminPortal:
- Check user profile object: account status should be "active"

Pro app
- The 6 entry-level positions should be auto-approved 

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/vwx12345-8888-9999-0000-111111111123)
